Thursday, February 24, 2011

Cancer, AIDS. 1981-2010

New York Times articles featuring the words cancer or AIDS each month from 1981-2010.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
